articles.title: Twitter, Apple, Meta, and other big tech companies together fired thousands of employees in last few months - India Today
articles.description: Big tech giants including Apple, Meta, Twitter, Amazon and others are suffering the worst from the ongoing economic slowdown. This has lead to mass layoffs at top tech firms.
